title: What online certification courses can I join for 2 months after class 12th being a science student? What are some website links that provide the same? - Quora

response.answer_text: Learn Basic Computer skills and Programming Basics, and keep practising throughout the College days, so that you gain mastery. If you already don’t lnow, learn Mnemonics, ssssso that you remember the vast amount of content you learn, ad remain able to recall and use them in practical applicatio. Coding Ninja Udemy(Almost every course is here) Coursera edX Udacity or Contact Nearest Computer Centre(If you are interested in Computer). All the above platforms provides certification after completion and payment of certification fee.
